document_data.name: Eigersstor Noblerot
document_data.mainbody: '''Eigersstor Noblerot''' was an alcoholic drink from the city of [[Neverwinter]]. It was exported as far as the [[Western Heartlands]], the lands along the [[River Chionthar]], and the city of [[Baldur's Gate]], as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Named after [[Eigersstor]], an early incarnation of the the City of Skilled Hands, Noblerot had a distinct Neverwintran taste – earthy and chewy. The drink itself had a slightly green tint. Eigersstor Noblerot was bottled in round bottles of green [[glass]], encased in a [[wicker]].
